### Tender Announcement: Psychologist Services

**Solicitation Number:** M5000-24-1089/A
**Publication Date:** 2023-12-13
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-02-07T15:00:00
**Amendment Number:** 6
**Amendment Date:** 2024-02-07

**Agency Name:** Royal Canadian Mounted Police
**Agency Address:** 10065 Jasper Avenue NW, Edmonton, Alberta T5J 3B1

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking the services of up to 2 psychologists to provide specialized clinical psychological assessments to regular and civilian members, conduct psychological debriefings, perform psychological screenings, and coordinate and deliver preventative health programs. The contract period is for 2 years with an irrevocable option to extend it for up to 3 additional 1-year periods.

**Key Requirements:**

* Provide clinical psychological assessments to RCMP members
* Conduct psychological debriefings and screenings
* Coordinate and deliver preventative health programs
* Work an estimated 20 hours per week each (or 40 hours per week)

**Selection Criteria:**

* The bid must comply with the requirements of the bid solicitation and meet all mandatory technical evaluation criteria to be declared responsive.
* The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award.

**Mandatory Documents:**

* Tender documents can be downloaded from: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities
* NOAA notices can be found on the same website.

**Bidder Requirements:**

* Bidders must submit their tender electronically to: NWR_Procurement_Bids@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
* The bid must be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Additional Information:**

* The RCMP has adopted the Integrity Regime, administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada.
* Indigenous businesses interested in participating in this tender are encouraged to register in the Federal Indigenous Business Directory (IBD).
* For more information, visit: www.canada.ca/indigenousbusinessdirectory.

Contact Information:
